statements: DELETE FROM BalanceSheet WHERE id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM balance_sheet WHERE id = 100 AND date = '2021-01-15';
DELETE FROM income_statement WHERE expenses > 5000 AND date < '2021-04-30';
DELETE FROM balance_sheet WHERE asset = 'Cash' AND liabilities = 'Accounts Payable';
DELETE FROM balance_sheet WHERE liabilities = 'Loans Payable' AND asset = 'Property';
DELETE FROM company WHERE company_name = 'Example Company';
DELETE FROM income_statement WHERE expenses > 5000 AND revenue < 10000;
DELETE FROM balance_sheet WHERE date = '2022-01-01' AND assets > 10000;
